name: smoozoo
description: This is Smoozoo - a super-smooth, performant and modern image viewer for the web

scripts.buildminimal: npm run prebuild && npx parcel build src/examples/minimal.js --no-source-maps --no-content-hash --public-url ./ --no-scope-hoist && cp src/examples/minimal.html dist
scripts.builddefault: npm run prebuild && npx parcel build src/examples/default.js --no-source-maps --no-content-hash --public-url ./ --no-scope-hoist && cp src/examples/default.html dist
scripts.buildall: npx parcel build src/examples/*.js --no-source-maps --public-url ./ --no-scope-hoist && cp src/examples/*.html dist

author: https://github.com/romland
